name: Astral Generators
description: A Minecraft mod that I made for a Create: Astral, a Minecraft modpack. Designed to add more new generators and crafting recipes to the game.

name: CodeBebeLib
description: A fork of a Minecraft library mod named CodeChickenLib for Fabric.

name: Defined's Blocks
description: A Minecraft mod maintained by me. It adds decorative blocks from other popular mods without requiring those mods to be installed. Perfect for enhancing builds with a wider variety of aesthetic blocks.

name: Dangerous Glass
description: A Minecraft mod that adds new mechanism to glass blocks in Minecraft, players will be poisoned and blinded for a few seconds when standing near and breaking them
